Title: Provides that certain communications made without malice regarding an incident of sexual assault, harassment or discrimination shall be deemed privileged
Summary: Provides that certain communications made without malice regarding an incident of sexual assault, harassment or discrimination shall be deemed privileged; provides that a prevailing defendant in an action brought against such defendant for making a communication that is privileged shall be entitled to attorney's fees and costs for such defense.
LawCode: Amd ยง74, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to privileged communications in defamation actions
